title: About the 10 Year Giveaway gifts
body:
Hello People. 
I'd like to ask If I would get the riot kayle and the Poro Summoner icon when I'm temporarily banned 
knowing that I'm suspended till 26 September 
So will I get the Skin and the icon or not?
And Thanks.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
Well okay {{champion:17}}  Thanks
But is there any method to know I got the skin yet or no? like a website or something?
and thanks for your reply :D
It may show up in your purchase history via the in-game store!

Per the [announcements](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/riot-games/announcements/thank-you), account with behavioral occurrences will still be able to receive these gifts.  We'll be posting updates on the roll out of the content in our [support ticker](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-).  Let me know if you have any other questions!
